metadata.title: CVE-2014-7835 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: webservice/upload.php in Moodle 2.6.x before 2.6.6 and 2.7.x before 2.7.3does not ensure that a file upload is for a private or draft area, whichallows remote authenticated users to upload files containing JavaScript,and consequently conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks, by specifyingthe profile-picture area.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
